item.title: Staffzone- only staff can tele
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:9, topic:519642”]Did you tell him why it was wrong?
Did you tell him how to fix it?
No.
Did you just throw code out and tell him it works how he wants?
Yes.
You spoodfed him.[/quote]

He read our reply’s and said thanks, do you really he think he gives a shit why it was not working? If he was really bothered about learning Java, logical operators would be one of the very first things he would of learnt.

If you’re crying over spoon feeding why don’t you help out everybody else that posts in the help section and tell them exactly what was wrong etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Staffzone- only staff can tele
item.dc:creator: @GodexCAB GodexCAB
item.description:
@GodexCAB wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:9, topic:519642”]Did you tell him why it was wrong?
Did you tell him how to fix it?
No.
Did you just throw code out and tell him it works how he wants?
Yes.
You spoodfed him.[/quote]

Did you have to come on here being like a jackass?
No.

I showed him what to do pretty much with the && c.playerRights <= 3) { so if he is even a decent coder, then he should realize that he needs to do that for all of his staff commands.
Quit being a jackass and stay off my level.
[size=5pt]I win.[/size]

item.title: Staffzone- only staff can tele
item.dc:creator: @GodexCAB GodexCAB
item.description:
@GodexCAB wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:7, topic:519642”]Great, you spoonfed.
Want to teach him why it was letting donors teleporting?

So what you had, OP, was && c.playerRights >= 1
That means “and if c.playerRights are greater than or equal to 1, then you can do do the following”
What Godex and Arick are adding is “&& c.playerRights >= 1 && c.playerRights <= 3”
Which means “and if c.playerRights are greater than or equal to 1 but also if c.playerRights are less than or equal to 3, then you can do the following”

Here’s some operators for you:

== means equal to

greater than
< less than
= greater than or equal to
<= less than or equal to
|| or
&& and[/quote]

You don’t have to say we are spoonfeeding him… We are helping him.

Read full topic

item.title: Staffzone- only staff can tele
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Great, you spoonfed.
Want to teach him why it was letting donors teleporting?

So what you had, OP, was && c.playerRights >= 1
That means “and if c.playerRights are greater than or equal to 1, then you can do do the following”
What Godex and Arick are adding is “&& c.playerRights >= 1 && c.playerRights <= 3”
Which means “and if c.playerRights are greater than or equal to 1 but also if c.playerRights are less than or equal to 3, then you can do the following”

Here’s some operators for you:

== means equal to

greater than
< less than
= greater than or equal to
<= less than or equal to
|| or
&& and

item.title: Staffzone- only staff can tele
item.dc:creator: @Carmex Carmex
item.description:
@Carmex wrote:

Okay so I’ve been making a staff zone but I only want mods(1) admin(2) and owner(3) to be able to teleport to the staffzone.
Below I have the code I’m using. The only problem is that it also lets donators(4-6) teleport to the staffzone aswell. I’m not sure how to fix this.

if (playerCommand.equals("staffzone") && c.playerRights >= 1) { c.getPA().startTeleport(3233, 9318, 0, "modern"); ///c.sendMessage("Welcome to StaffZone."); }

Read full topic
